mapper.select: SELECT book_id, book_img, book_seller_id, book_price, book_writer, book_title, book_type, book_descripe, is_review, is_banned FROM book WHERE is_review = 1 AND is_banned = 0 LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT book_id, book_img, book_seller_id, book_price, book_writer, book_title, book_type, book_descripe, is_review, is_banned FROM book WHERE book_id = #{book_id} AND is_review = 1 AND is_banned = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (book_title, book_writer, book_img, book_seller_id, book_price, book_type, book_descripe, is_review, is_banned) VALUES (#{book_title}, #{book_writer}, #{book_img}, #{book_seller_id}, #{book_price}, #{book_type}, #{book_descripe}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE is_review = 0 LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT * FROM book WHERE is_banned = 1 LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
